          <title>
            <string language="fr">Fibres Optiques</string>
            <string language="en">Optical Fibres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Fasern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fibras Óticas</string>

          <description>
            <string language="fr">Signaux infrarouges : Fibres optiques.  Animation montrant comment les fibres optiques et les fils de cuivre supportent des transmissions.</string>
            <string language="en">Infrared signals: Optical fibres. Animation showing how optical fibres and copper wires carry communications.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotsignale: Optische Fasern. 
Animationvertretung, wie optische Fasern und kupferne Leitungen 
Kommunikationen tragen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais infravermelhos: Fibras óticas. 
Exibição do animation como as fibras óticas e os fios de 
cobre carregam comunicações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali infrarossi: Fibre ottiche. 
Rappresentazione di animazione come le fibre ottiche ed i legare
di rame trasportano le comunicazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπέρυθρα σήματα: Οπτικές ίνες. Ζωτικότητα
που επιδεικνύει πώς οι οπτικές ίνες και τα καλώδια χαλκού 
φέρνουν τις επικοινωνίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales infrarrojas: Fibras ópticas. 
Demostración de la animación cómo las fibras ópticas y los 
alambres de cobre llevan comunicaciones.</string>
          </description>
